articles.author: Kabir Firaque
articles.title: Explained: How remdesivir tricks coronavirus - The Indian Express
articles.description: Remdesivir is designed to obstruct the stage of replication, when the virus creates copies of itself, followed endlessly by the copies creating copies of themselves.
articles.content:
Written by Kabir Firaque
